summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3722 , for the improvement of 59th Avenue Southwest, from West Stevens Street to West Hanford Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 45697 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
